entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Otherwise sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
